data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the away team a throw-in.
Hacken are caught offside.
Goal kick for Hacken at Stadion.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Hacken.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Goal! Ola Toivonen gives Malmo a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 6, Isaac Thelin with an assist there.
Hacken's Patrik Walemark gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Malmo defender.
Malmo needs to be cautious. Hacken have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Hacken close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Malmo.
Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 13, Hacken will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Malmo.
Throw-in for Malmo in the half of Hacken.
An unfortunate own goal by Isaac Thelin makes the score 2-0.
In the minute 16, Jonas Knudsen instrumental with a fine assist.
Hacken drive upfield and Patrik Walemark gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Malmo defender.
Malmo are coming forward and Arnor Traustason gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Malmo.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Malmo's half?
Erdal Rakip is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 25, Malmo have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Erdal Rakip has recovered and rejoins the match in Malmo.
Malmo to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
In the minute 26, Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Malmo.
Can Malmo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hacken's half?
In the minute 28, Malmo drive upfield at Stadion and Arnor Traustason hits the bar with a header.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a throw-in for Malmo, close to Hacken's area.
Malmo are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 30, Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Hacken a goal kick.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 32, Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Malmo at Stadion.
At Stadion, Erdal Rakip has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Malmo.
Malmo have a dangerous throw-in.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a throw-in for Malmo, close to Hacken's area.
In the minute 36, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Hacken throw-in in Malmo's half.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Malmo at Stadion.
Malmo have a goal kick.
Throw-in Malmo.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Hacken's Daleho Irandust has been booked in Malmo.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Malmo.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Stadion.
Mohammed Al-Hakim has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Hacken in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Hacken!
The away team replace Alexander Soderlund with Jasse Tuominen.
In the minute 49, Hacken drives forward and Daleho Irandust gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Malmo.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
In the minute 51, Isaac Thelin puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Malmo needs to be cautious. Hacken have an attacking throw-in.
In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 54, Ahmed Yasin is booked for the away team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Isaac Thelin for Malmo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Hacken close to the penalty box.
At Stadion, Hacken are penalized for being offside.
Malmo advance rapidly upfield but Mohammed Al-Hakim blows for offside.
In the minute 58, Malmo’s Isaac Thelin is on his feet again at Stadion.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Malmo.
The home team have replaced Erdal Rakip with Bonke Innocent. This is the first substitution made today by Jon Dahl Tomasson.
Important block from the Hacken defence as Soren Rieks fires in a strike for Malmo.
In the minute 61, Jon Dahl Tomasson is making the team's second substitution at Stadion with Soren Rieks replacing Jo Inge Berget.
It seems as if Isaac Thelin is unable to continue. Adi Nalic replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Malmo.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Malmo to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
In the minute 64, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Hacken just outside Malmo's area.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Malmo.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Malmo have a dangerous throw-in.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hacken's half?
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 70, Free kick Malmo.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jasse Tuominen (Hacken) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 73, Andreas Alm (Hacken) is making a second substitution, with Gustav Berggren replacing Alexander Faltsetas.
Viktor Lundberg is replacing Patrik Walemark for Hacken at Stadion.
Can Malmo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hacken's half?
In the minute 75, Malmo have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Malmo push upfield but Mohammed Al-Hakim quickly pulls them for offside.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Hacken throw-in in Malmo's half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Malmo at Stadion.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Hacken throw-in in Malmo's half.
Throw-in for Hacken close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Malmo's half?
Rasmus Lindgren (Hacken) has received a yellow card from Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Adi Nalic is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 82, Hacken are whistled for offside.
Malmo's Adi Nalic looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, Hacken make their fourth substitution with Johan Hammar replacing Rasmus Lindgren.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, In Malmo, Hacken push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Throw-in Malmo.
Kevin Yakob is replacing Ahmed Yasin for the away team.
In the minute 89, Amin Sarr is on a sub for Arnor Traustason for Malmo.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Malmo to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Hacken capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Daleho Irandust (Hacken) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Malmo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Malmo.
In Malmo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
